WellGo permissions instructions To ensure the normal use of the APP, please enable the following permissions Use the Bluetooth function Need to use the phone\'s Bluetooth function to connect to the Bluetooth watch Use Location Map running track record and search Bluetooth watch need to turn on the phone GPS switch Location permission usage WellGo collect location data to support athletic fitness tracking, even when the app is closed or not in use. Camera permission use Use the camera to take a picture as an avatar File read and write permission usage The camera takes a picture and saves, select a picture from the album as the avatar Use of phone permissions Message reminder function, incoming call reminds the watch to check the current incoming call status Use of permissions for contacts and address book When a call comes in, the watch can display the name and phone number Location permission instructions To view the track record of the sports map, please allow WellGo to use your location WellGo will collect location information data to support the track record function. With location enabled, you will get a more accurate location history. Disallowed location information may not obtain accurate movement track records!
